original_text: In the crowd, there were men who took taxes from people. These men also wanted John to baptize them. They asked him, ‘Teacher, what should we do?’
korean_text: 세리들도 세례를 받고자 하여 와서 이르되 선생이여 우리는 무엇을 하리이까 하매

sentences.original_text: In the crowd, there were men
These men also wanted John to baptize them
sentences.korean_translation: 이 사람들 역시 요한에게 세례를 받고자 하였다
